author: Ryan Sidle
title: Wojciech Szczesny Has Just Deleted Some Very Dodgy Photos From His Instagram Account - TheSPORTbible
text:
Wojciech Szczesny Has Just Deleted Some Very Dodgy Photos From His Instagram Account Wed Feb 08 2017 13:17:45 GMT+0000 (GMT) Wed Feb 08 2017 13:17:45 GMT+0000 (GMT) Joe Baiamonte Joe Baiamonte in football 
Footballers and social media is always going to be a combination as dangerous as Donald Trump and nuclear codes, yet much like they have with the US President and the fate of the world as we know it, some people are still of the mindset of "what's the worst that could happen?" 
Wojciech Szczesny could happen. That's what could fucking happen. 
Earlier today, the former Arsenal goalkeeper's Instagram account was updated with a deluge of snaps of girls in various states of undress, showing off an incredibly X Rated 'two up top' and 'back line'. Credit: Wojciech Szczesny/Instagram 
The photos have since been deleted and it appears the Polish stopper, now at Roma, has had his account hacked. How this has actually happened is unclear, whether it's a vengeful Arsenal supporting cyber criminal out to ruin Szczesny's career or simply a friend having a laugh. The Roma man has posted a follow up message to clear up any confusion, although states that his hacker still has access to his account for the time being... Feb 8, 2017 at 5:00am PST 
We'll be honest, we were hoping this Twitter user was going to be correct, instead... Hope Szczęsny hasn't been hacked, he's just decided to start posting filth on his instagram. #FreeSzczęsny 
Maybe update your password from 'Wojciech123' or 'Goalkeeper1', Wojciech, mate. Featured Image Credit: PA
